Can someone make a mod with magnetic wheels or is there one already. I would want the wheels to be able to stick to the ground so u can go at fast speeds and not flip. Maybe make it were it would use more electric charge when the magnet is on.

Oh and make use tweakscale if you can.

You prob should check this out: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/84102-WIP-PARTS-PLUGIN-0-25-Kerbal-Foundries-wheels-anti-grav-repulsors-and-tracks

Either you get a track, which will provide better ground grip than wheels, or you can just go sci-fi and use hover parts. Any wheeled vehicle will flip if you go too fast.

Or you would attach the wheels not directly to your rover's body, but to additional beams or panels, attached to the body - as an insect's legs.

Put an ion engine on the roof of your rover Its thrust should be enough to press your rover against the ground.
